Author: medicalchain
Title: [ANN]Medicalchain - Electronic Health Records Powered By Blockchain Technology
Body: Medicalchain Building the future of healthcare     What is Medicalchain?  Medicalchain is a decentralized platform that enables secure, fast and transparent exchange and usage of medical data. We introduce utilization of blockchain technology to store patient health records and maintain a single version of the patient’s true data. Medicalchain will enable different healthcare agents such as doctors, hospitals, laboratories, pharmacists and insurers to request permission to access and interact with medical records. Each interaction is auditable, transparent, and secure, and will be recorded as a transaction on Medicalchain’s distributed ledger. Moreover, no privacy is lost in this process; Medicalchain is built on the permission based Hyperledger Fabric architecture which allows varying access levels; patients control who can view their records, how much they see and for what length of time. Medicalchain is dedicated to empowering patients, improving outcomes, and building healthcare infrastructure for the future.  Read more about Medicalchain in our whitepaper below:   WHITE PAPER  Check out our YouTube video here:   Medicalchain explainer video  More about Medicalchain Medicalchain is based in London, UK. It was founded by Dr Albeyatti and Mo Tayeb who quickly expanded the team and added several high caliber advisers. In total, our team has decades of experience in healthcare, IT, and startups as well as a deep passion for blockchain technology and the way it can improve people's lives. A full profile of our team can be view HERE.  Pre-sale details We're hosting a pre-sale to give early backers a chance to contribute.  Tokens: 6,300,000 Price: $0.10 Discount: 50% Pre-sale cap: $630,000 equivalent in ETH Timing: 15th September - 15th October  Want to help out? We're looking for driven people to help us with our bitcointalk campaigns. Contact me by PM, email robert@medicalchain.com, or join our Telegram if you are interested.  For the moment we have translation opportunities free for a number of languages and have plans to launch a bigger and more robust bounty campaign soon. To view which languages have been completed please check the spreadsheet here.  Reach out to my via PM, email, or Telegram above and I'll get back to you asap. Compensation will be in tokens at competitive rates.
